channel.title: Worse drug busts for you or a friend
channel.description:
well just tell your worst drug bust that happen to you.
e and my other 2 friends, were go to the topsfield fair. One of my friends wanted to sneak in so we said ok and i am really good at sneaking in, but my freindd wanted to sneak in formthe main entrance. MY friend who didnt have money fell behind from talking on his cell, thenit happen to him the police caught him. Me and my other friend were about 70 yards away from my firiend who got caught and we were going to walk out since there wasnt a way to get in. Then are friend who got caught ratted us out and then pointed us out to the pice and they cam chargin over and got us. I tried using my famous exucse that usally works is that i wnet to go get money from my moms car, they didnt buy it and they wanted to see my moms car. I tried to play stupid and i said i dont know what kind of she has lol. Then we were there for about a hour trying to get out of the mess. Then my friend who got cuahgt ratted us even mnore and said that we snuck in on firday last week and we did but didnt get caught but he got caught trying to sneak in last weeek, too. Me and my friend denied it of course. They took are names street adress and phone number and what town we lived in. Then the cops asked us if we had any drugs. My friend who got caught first had about 5 grams of weed on him and keeps it in a baggy in 2 clean socks, but before we went my other friend threw his socks away so it was just in the baggy. Of course my friend said he didnt have any drugs on him. So they mad ehim empty out his pockets and he keep the 5 grams of weed in his pocke thinmking he was safe. Then the cop felt him and found the bag and luaghed and said it hought you didnt have any drugs this keeps getting better and better. They handcuffed him and then they searched my friend but before they did he kept on saying i want a warrent please, for about 3 minsutes before they searched him. The cops luahged at him saying we dont need a warrent to search you so they made him empty out his pockets he kept his chilum in trhe pocket. Then the cop felt him to see if he kept naything in his pocekts the cop pushes up the chilum about half way and then pushes it back down. I think they wree doing my friend a favor on that. Then they searched me but all i had was cash and a cell phone. Me and my friend with the chilum got to leave, since he we didnt have any drugs. The next day my friend who got caught had to go to court and he got 6 months of probation and 20 hours of community service and teh funny part is my friend gets off punishment on monday and gets to go to the fair

item.title: Worse drug busts for you or a friend
item.dc:creator: @footballplayar34 footballplayar34
item.description:
@footballplayar34 wrote:

Got_Shine:

Football… What in the hell kind of a douche bag friend rats like that… Why did he do that? Its like he wanted you to get caught. How did ratting about sneaking in previously help him at all? What a douche bag I would ditch that kid so fast.

lol we slap the shit out oif him school now and punch him and shit he says he cant do anything back cuz if he does he goes to juvy lol(which i think is total bs) and i asked him why he ratted us out and he said the cops were lieing to us-_-

Read full topic
item.source: Worse drug busts for you or a friend

item.title: Worse drug busts for you or a friend
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

This one time I was chhlin out with my friends in tbere basement smokin some weed , and after i take a hit there mom comes down… she never comes doen stairs and that was the first time in like 3 years lol… she took a deep breath and said who has it… and I had the bong next to me where she couldnt see i tried to x hale sloely but she saw me… she walked over and took the bong and went up stairs lol… I was scared… few minutes later i walked up for a glass of water and I see the weed was all gone… smoked… I told my friend and they said o ya didn’t we tell you… our mom smoks too… my heart skipped lol Then I started laughing my ass off…

Read full topic
item.source: Worse drug busts for you or a friend

item.title: Worse drug busts for you or a friend
item.dc:creator: @SSPAC SSPAC
item.description:
@SSPAC wrote:

I was in my bath room smoking cigarretes one time, and then my mom knocked on the door and said open up. I put the cigarrete in the toilet and opened up the bathroom door. I don’t really know what she was thinking at that moment, but I think she saw the smoke and probably smelled it in my hair…I dont really think she cared to much, she just told me it was stupid and to stop…I guess tobacco really isnt THAT bad even though its not good for you, but I haven’t dont a major drug before.

Read full topic
item.source: Worse drug busts for you or a friend

item.title: Worse drug busts for you or a friend
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

One time a cop told me to stop shotting at JFK.

I was all like… WTF?

And he was like stop…

So I did… and shot him…

He was like… WTF?

And searched me…

He found 11 grams of cocaine, 3 grams of crack, some lsd and X

I sold it to him for $720.00 USD.

Read full topic
item.source: Worse drug busts for you or a friend

item.title: Worse drug busts for you or a friend
item.dc:creator: @rjop455 rjop455
item.description:
@rjop455 wrote:

That’s pretty good. I’ve been lucky, so far, almost got busted a few times, and I had to run from the cops another. But I would say your story wins. :).

Read full topic
